posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
Greetings and salutations to all!

Apparently, Kail forgot or was unable to sticky his Build Request Guidelines topic which has consequently gotten buried amid the proliferation of hundreds of requests.

Still, it's important information needed by new builders.  For those of you that wish to submit either a request or a work-in-progress build version, please review the guidelines compiled by our absent illustrious leader HERE.

Happy building wherever you may roam

edit (07/10/2014): Build Request Guidelines has been stickied in the Build Request/Unfinalized Builds subforum.
